section1.title: Introduction
section1.content1: Land less than one thousand square meters is held by OSO Fund, and can choose fund management and development or investment and operation.
section1.content2: Land over 1,000 square meters can be sold by itself. In this case, we will deploy your on-chain NFT and unlock the corresponding rights in the virtual world, provide you with a series of facilities issued by the government for the corresponding land.

section2.title: Advantages
section2.content1: The Meta City Fund is managed transparently, with all land transactions and management recorded on the blockchain so anyone can review, investigate and supervise it.
section2.content2: As the assets grow, OSO Fund can submit to supervision agency and intermediary fund operations are compliant, and complete reports and asset management are legally issued.
